# OneHotEncoder.Transformer

**Structure**

A transformer that encodes a category as an array of integers.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Transformer
```

## Creating a transformer

- **init(categories:)**: Creates a one-hot encoder.

## Getting the categories

- **categories**: Unique values to encode
- **category(at:)**: Retrieves the category at the one-hot encoding index.

## Performing the transformation

- **applied(_:eventHandler:)**: Performs a one-hot encoding on a sequence of inputs.
- **applied(to:eventHandler:)**: Performs a one-hot encoding on a single input.
